website_summaries.verdict: This powdered milk tastes more like chai, but retains the benefits of turmeric.
pros: Unlike some golden milk powders, this one mixes easily and won't settle at the bottom
Several users report relief with digestive and inflammatory issues
Tumaquik can also help you fall asleep better
cons: The spice levels are unpleasant for some people

customer_reviews.title: A trend that’s better off left to the original creators
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, semi-bitter milk flavoring. Coming from an Indian household, using turmeric as an antibacterial is not some new-age cure for which we needed to pay this much money. Being a millennial, however, requires that I follow trends and try weird stuff. My moms home made turmeric milk with a dash of honey, black pepper, and turmeric (all ingredients that cost a max of $5) was way better. The proportion of spices in this mixture yields a bitter after taste. You are better off making your own with organic turmeric, cardamom powered, black pepper, etc. we also use turmeric atleast once if not twice a day in our cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeets

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Growing up my mom made me drink turmeric milk for muscle aches, but it always tasted awful. This stuff tastes great - it is more like a chai than turmeric milk, and it mixes really well - i use it with almond milk and all kinds of smoothies. Best of all, my joint pain started going away 1 week after i started using it!
customer_reviews.author: ASM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and no additives!!
customer_reviews.text: So good! I mixed it with warm macadamia milk and it’s delicious. It smells amazing and tastes even better. This will definitely become a daily habit for me! I’m glad I found a Golden Milk powder that doesn’t contain maltodextrin or other junk fillers.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

So much easier than making my own spice mix and making a mess. I'm thinking of experimenting and using this powder in cooking and baking, id addition to using it as a drink. I like to try new things. Sometimes I like them, sometimes I don't. But this product, I LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L.

customer_reviews.title: Yum in a tiny jar

I highly recommend it if you are looking for the benefits of tumeric.
customer_reviews.author: Jean L.

customer_reviews.title: this was a good consistency that dissolved nicely and I was able to ...

customer_reviews.title: Can be added to drinks, food, sweets & savories!

I appreciated the email hints from the company -- it is definitely easier to fish for the scoop with a fork vs. using your fingers. The container was a little smaller than I expected for something with 90 servings, but a little bit really does go a long way!
customer_reviews.author: tmsj

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!!!

Then add a squirt of honey (this stuff isn't sweet). Then pour into a mug and microwave. I drink it before bed. It relaxes me and helps with inflammation.

Time will tell if I'm a complete convert from my raw recipe.

customer_reviews.author: Christine Morrison

customer_reviews.title: This is sooooo good!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. When it first arrived, I was surprised by how small it was, but the scoop is very tiny. I mix one tiny scoop in a sauce pan with 8 oz of almond milk and one packet of stevia. It tastes like a chai tea latte without all the calories and sugar. I cannot comment yet on if the turmeric itself is helping my inflammation, as I have only had this a few times. I hope to be better about having it daily. Either way, I love the taste and the warmth of it. I will definitely reorder!
customer_reviews.author: GMS Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Chai-ish
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends, who is an avid chai tea and chai latte drinker, turned me on to the “gold.” It has spices like chai, but is definitely a different flavor. Something new to try. Glad I went with this brand, the absent sugar content allows you to make it super sweet or very earthy/spicy.
customer_reviews.author: Sontino Trigilio

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: First time I've tried this product so I'm not really certain about the efficacy yet in regards to pain relief. I've only taken it for a few days. I tried it with almond milk and a little sugar and that was pleasant tasting. The next day I added it to my butternut squash soup and it was delicious. Today I added to my maple and brown sugar quick oatmeal. Yummy. I'd describe this herbal mix as extremely versatile. It goes well with sweet and savory foods. Now to see, if after a few weeks of consumption, if my joint aches ease off. Time will tell. In the meantime, I'm going to keep cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Emlinger

customer_reviews.title: Great taste.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for almost a year. I add a teaspoon to my coffee each morning. Not sure how much pain relief I get from this as I take Bromelain and Frankincense for pain as well. It is a bit grainy and difficult to dissolve but I don’t mind as I put my golden milk with my collagen and coffee into the blender and them it is really frothy and good.
customer_reviews.author: Mydoray

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Provides stress and pain relief.
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product was organic but other than that it's a winner. The jar is small but you only need to add a small amount to some kind of milk product. I add a little pure maple syrup or raw honey for sweetener as well. Previously, I had been purchasing golden milk with coconut and monk fruit so you just needed to add to water, but it's gotten so expensive that this golden milk is my now go to product. I'm really happy with it and will be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: 6bucks

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the top cracked and safety seal cracked. Super frustrating, given the price I paid for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen06

customer_reviews.title: WONT BE WITHOUT IT
customer_reviews.text: I had used other turmeric milk with good results but I still had aches and pains. Once I started using this brand, the aches and pains have gone away. I have it with coconut milk and protein powder as my breakfast. My stomach has also improved. I LOVE that it is free of preservatives, starch, peanuts, tree nuts, gluten, sugar, artificial color, and yeast! I WONT BE WITHOUT IT
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: tasty and healthy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the good reviews and wanting to try the tumeric golden milk with out the hassle. I mixed it with milk and heated it. The taste was good, like a chai tea. I would have given it a 5 stars except for the peppery taste. Im not a fan of black pepper. I do understand that the black pepper gives better absorption of the tumeric so it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: By Grace

customer_reviews.title: not great tasting or disolving and stains
customer_reviews.text: Can't say this one has worked for us, the flavor is a bit strong (vanilla almond milk helps some) and it leaves gold stains on my white fridge if I get any on my fingers. Plus though the scoop is really small it leaves quite a bit in the bottom of the cup so not sure how much I am actually getting of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but powder settles
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. It’s the best golden milk product I’ve tried. It doesn’t have any added fats or sweeteners. I like making it with Oatley oat milk (if you can find it!). The flavor is perfect however my one complaint is that a lot of the powder settles to the bottom of my mug even when I use an electric frother to mix it in. I didn’t notice any improvement when I tried coconut milk (full fat). Overall, I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Movies4life

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things you can take to end your day. First, In today's busy electronic world Melatonin, Valerian and Chamomile are needed to get your brain to power down. second Tumeric is the number one natural anti-inflammatory supplement you can take and all illnesses today stem from inflammation so its a must. This is my top supplement next to my mushroom extracts!
customer_reviews.author: payton265

customer_reviews.title: This is not great
customer_reviews.text: The taste is awful. I have to put it in hot chocolate so I can drink it. It does not relax me or make me sleep. I can take it anytime of day and it has zero effect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Provides pain relief and more energy
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using this product I have noticed remarkable reduction in pain and increased level of energy. I use it make tumeric tea( just add hot water) and also with hot milk and tea spoon of honey. Probably the best golden milk available. Also great value for 90 servings. I will strongly recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Suresh Ramsinghani

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading about turmeric and its anti-inflammatory properties - was hoping it would help with my psoriasis. I use a scoop a day in oat milk and actually really like the taste - it is kind of like egg nog. After i raved about it my husband started using a scoop in his oatmeal and he is also a convert. I have been using it for about a month and it is definitely helping my psoriasis - the patches on my elbows are much improved and i will definitely keep using this fabulous product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Miller

customer_reviews.title: NO TASTE ...  none at all.
customer_reviews.text: I just made a cuppa with correct measures proportions and it has no taste at all. It tastes like warm milk. It makes me wonder if the spices are old and have lost all flavor. If it makes me sleepy I will be happy but warm milk does that on its own. I am going to add extra cinnamon tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: KrissyLizzy

customer_reviews.title: Helps making me feel sleepy
customer_reviews.text: Like many people, I couldn't believe something like this could bring back the feeling of feeling sleepy naturally. Anxiety meds and age combined to cause insomnia. This doesn't cure insomniac, but if I drink this about 8pm, I gradually get sleepy and go to bed 2-3 hours later. Surprised and thankful.
customer_reviews.author: John Casebeer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite drink is chai tea with a scoop of Golden Milk Powder, Nutpods creamer and a teaspoon of Manuka honey. Delicious!! It mixes quite well, but it will leave a residue at the bottom of your mug. I keep a spoon in while drinking to stir any powder that may have settled.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I just don't notice any difference whatsoever when I take this. Tastes pretty good but does not mix in well with other liquids. I tried hot coffee, cold oat milk. It just kinda lumps up and does it's own thing. Also it stains whatever container you put it in so just beware.
customer_reviews.author: Cortez the Killer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RESULTS!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of the super sleep version, one tub for me and one for my parents. My dad has been complaining of muscle aches and my mom has arthritis. After a week of taking this, they both reported significant improvement in their pain as well as getting good amount of sleep every night. As for me—I too have been getting great sleep every night, and I don’t remember the last time I felt my usual lower back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine T

customer_reviews.title: I'm amazed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried natural remedies to help me sleep in YEARS because they didn't work. Took a chance on this blend because I use the Tumeric drink blend by this company every day. IT WORKS (for me) A total and lovely surprise. I use it with almond milk at night an 1/2 later I'm sleepy, giving me 5 minutes to wrap everything up before conking out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen I Myers

customer_reviews.title: Err
customer_reviews.text: No.. hell no! Idk why people are saying this tastes good. I should have re-thunk this whole situation when it said 3.2 oz, get the one at Walmart at least it has the honey already added. This was not righteous — at all! Don’t get me started on the miniature scoop 🤦‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with swelling of lower legs and feet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I noticed a Big change in the swelling of my lower legs and feet.
customer_reviews.author: arnita m lubberts

customer_reviews.title: I just wish they would send me the rest of the mix!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, taste is more mild than expected- can't discern other flavors, but I like it. HOWEVER, I ordered the large size and it was only about half full. THAT is frustrating to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth, great tasting in milk. It works wonders on the joints. If you like chai tea you will like this. The cardamom & black pepper ingredients that are in this product is just a tad bit strong for me. So every night, I have added just a dash of the following ingredients either in assorted combinations or each individual: ground cloves, ground nutmeg, ground ginger, cinnamon, &/or vanilla flavoring. It all has to do with one's taste buds. Don't be afraid to add something in to make it taste better for you.
customer_reviews.author: AnitaA

customer_reviews.title: Truly Golden
customer_reviews.text: I drink this twice daily in warm milk usually, or put in in oatmeal, smoothies, coffee or yogurt parfaits. I is probably good in tea as well, but I haven't tried that yet. It reminds me of chai latte, and is very soothing. I stated drinking this for the health benefits and to help reduce inflammation in my body. My aching foot feels much better since I have been drinking this, so I feel that it is working.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah
customer_reviews.text: So so so yummy and good. I’m addicted to it already. I am blown away that it taste so good and live the benefits. I’m use to taking the supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Luvprincess

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff! I add some cinnamon & honey then a little hot water. I stir to dissolve & add about 8 oz of cold unsweetened almond milk. Voila. A wonderful golden latte! And I love that it's organic and contains curcumonoids with pepper.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Lou Mar

customer_reviews.title: Not like first one
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase of this product. The first jar of powder was great so I ordered a second. What a difference and disappointment. The second had hardly any flavor, the container was only half full, it did not mix well and had tiny fibers in it. This was nothing at all like the first jar and I ended up throwing it out. What a shame. Will not order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of turmeric milk! My husband has been adding this with water and we have also tried with regular milk and coconut milk! Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Gi Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Great product to aid the inflammatory process
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff that takes the guess work out of measuring. Plus it contains all the good stuff we need plus pepper to aid absorption in the liver.
customer_reviews.author: JulesE

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This has the same ingredients of the tonic I was making. My tonic had gobs of spices that did not blend into my mix. This stuff mixes pretty well. There are some spices left over at the bottom of your cup, but not enough to get angry about. It's very easy to make the drink. The taste is pleasant enough that I don't add my stevia. I've only been drinking golden milk for about 2 weeks now so I don't know how effective this is yet.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Player

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and good for you
customer_reviews.text: I love this golden milk drink. I bring it to work and have it mid morning. I heat a cup of water and add half and half and a scoop of powder and it is a nice treat. Amazing that this jar contains 90 servings. I've already ordered my second jar. One for home and one for work.
customer_reviews.author: AHanna

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I waited 2 months to actually try this and why IDK. It tastes amazing! Sometimes I make chai tea and add the scoop in and a splash of creamer and stir, lots of stirring. It is delicious! This is now my go to drink in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleep and tastes great too
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. I have been struggling with falling asleep. I was using melatonin, which helped, but I would wake up in BBC an hour and struggle to back to sleep. After I started taking this, I start feeling drowsy in about 20-30 mins and I have had the best sleep in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: avidonlineshopper

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how great it tastes. I make it with toasted coconut/almond milk, collagen peptides and a little bit of cinnamon. Great way to take turmeric not in a pill form.
customer_reviews.author: Ina

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb! So yummy! I alternate between regular milk and almond milk to make it. I then add some raw honey to sweeten it. I could drink this all day! It doesn’t give the pain relief I was looking for with the turmeric and ginger but I’ll keep drinking it because it tastes good. I’m going to try a turmeric and ginger supplement for my spodolitis
customer_reviews.author: ann heintz

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and coffee alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I try not to drink coffee every morning and I usually alternate this or Teeccino. This golden milk tastes a lot like when I make it at home with real turmeric! I add oat milk and honey to mine and really love it! Way easier than cutting turmeric and staining everything!
customer_reviews.author: Julie E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good taste, very calming and relaxing at night
customer_reviews.text: I like my golden milk a little spicier, so I use a little more than recommended and add an extra dash of ginger and cardamon (sp?). But I confess, I have a jaded palate and like to go heavy on spices. It is a very soothing nighttime drink and helps me fall asleep. I've been waking a little less, too, throughout the night. For added smoothness, I sometimes add coconut oil.
